description: JSON Schema for a LavishGUI2 Text Type

name.description: A name for the Text Type, which will be specified in Text Scanners for highlighting

terminators.description: a list of single-character strings, each indicating the end of the Text segment

character.description: a single-character string specifying the one and only valid character for this Text segment

sequence.description: a string specifying the one and only valid sequence for this Text segment

subOpenType.description: The name of the Text Type that opens a new instance of this container type, if found within. For example, "json_{" would open (start) a new JSON Object

escapeType.description: The name of the Text Type that enables escaping. (Tip: Use the built-in "escape" type.)

terminatorTypes.description: Defines terminators for the container. Text Type names map to an object containing options for terminating the container with that Text Type

characterTypes.description: Maps single characters (given as property names) to Text Types for processing

additionalProperties.description: The name of the Text Type that handles the given character

sequenceTypes.description: Maps character sequences (given as property names) to Text Types for processing

additionalProperties.description: The name of the Text Type that handles the given sequence
